data.expected_result: it displays as -\_\_- (that’s what all other clients do)
data.short_description: iOS client crashes when too many unescaped formatting characters are in a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Send the message in <https://hastebin.com/raw/liceqoyido> (it’s just a dash, 1998 underscores, and another dash at the end) - Your client should crash within a second of sending the message.
